title: Oceanic Gaming Community Tournament

embed.description: Battlefy is the simplest way to start, manage, and find esports tournaments | Create. Compete. Conquer.

body:
Thank you for all the amazing feedback we have gotten. We have taken it into consideration and here is our next tournament.

Improvements:
1. We changed our finals into a best of 3 series from a best of 1
2.  Our finals match will now be streamed on the Oceanic Gaming Twitch Channel
3.  The finals match will also be casted
4.  We have created our schedule for future tournaments

Be sure to check out our facebook page to keep up to date: https://www.facebook.com/OceanicGaming/
